name: Extreme Monster Truck 3d Parking
description:
Extreme Monster Truck 3d Parking


Wants To Ride in The Extreme Monster Truck,this 3D Extreme Monster Truck 3d Parking Game is really softness games and Park The Monster Truck in yours skill .This Game includes 3D Models of different Monster Truck and The Extreme 3D locations. Follow the green rounds and park your monster truck at given destination in limited time .3D View of A Location and the monster truck can attract the user really adventure games.Park The Monster Truck Carefully because the roads are too dangerous to ride.park the truck in given time and earn three stars.also there is a control options like Tilt,Steering and buttons.

Key Features of this game


-> 3D Models of The Different Monster Trucks

-> Easy Controlling with Tilt,Steering and Buttons

-> Different level and dangerous level.. check your skill

-> User Friendly game
